title: Drawing, Design for Sideboard of Mahogany with Serpentine Front, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Sideboard of Mahogany with Serpentine Front
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite lower right: SIDEBOARD / OF MAHAGONY; upper left with arrow pointing to backsplash: inlay; upper left corner: [numerical notations indicating dimensions]; below that: inlay; to right of left decorative border of right section of front, with arrow pointing to border: inlay
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Rectangular sideboard on six straight tapering legs; serpentine front has two drawers - the top one narrower - at center, each has pair of C-shaped handles; low backsplash.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Sideboard of Mahogany with Serpentine Front, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-20
